articles.title: Congress Protest Live: Over 200 Leaders Detained, Including Rahul & Priyanka - The Quint
articles.description: With political drama unfolding in the Parliament on Thursday over the alleged misuse of central investigative agencies such as the ED, the Congress party will hold a nationwide protest on Friday, 5 August, over unemployment and inflation.
